contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 2nd day of September, 2010, the Application for Leave to File Original Process, the Petition for Writ of Mandamus, and the Application for an Immediate Hearing on the Pending Petition for Writ of Mandamus are DISMISSED. See Commonwealth v. Reid, 537 Pa. 167, 642 A.2d 453 (1994) (hybrid representation is improper). The Prothonotary is directed to forward the filings to counsel of record.
